doc:
Anita Louise https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anita_Louise 0 Anita Louise (born Anita Louise Fremault, January 9, 1915 – April 25, 1970) was an American film and television actress best known for her performances in A Midsummer Night's Dream (1935), The Story of Louis Pasteur (1935), Anthony Adverse (1936), Marie Antoinette (1938) and The Little Princess (1939). She was named as a WAMPAS Baby Star, and frequently described as one of the cinema's most fashionable and stylish women. Louise had delicate features and blonde hair, with ageless grace, which saw her through 30 years in film, beginning as a child actress before becoming a featured player during Hollywood's Golden Age. Anita_Louise ( born Anita_Louise_Fremault , January_9_,_1915 – April_25_,_1970 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actress best_known for her_performances in A_Midsummer_Night 's_Dream ( 1935 ) , The_Story of Louis_Pasteur ( 1935 ) , Anthony_Adverse ( 1936 ) , Marie_Antoinette ( 1938 ) and The_Little_Princess ( 1939 ) . She was_named as a_WAMPAS_Baby_Star , and frequently_described as one of the_cinema 's most_fashionable and stylish_women . Louise had delicate_features and blonde_hair , with ageless_grace , which saw her through 30_years in film , beginning as a_child_actress before becoming a_featured_player during Hollywood 's_Golden_Age .
